code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Outlet}from'react-router-dom';import Navbar from'../components/Navbar';import Sidebar from'../components/Sidebar';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function DashboardLayout(){const[isMobile,setIsMobile]=useState(false);const[sidebarOpen,setSidebarOpen]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const checkMobile=()=>{const isMobileView=window.innerWidth<768;setIsMobile(isMobileView);setSidebarOpen(!isMobileView);};checkMobile();window.addEventListener('resize',checkMobile);return()=>window.removeEventListener('resize',checkMobile);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex flex-col",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{isMobile:isMobile,onToggleSidebar:()=>setSidebarOpen(!sidebarOpen)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-1 relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{isOpen:sidebarOpen,isMobile:isMobile,onClose:()=>setSidebarOpen(false)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:`flex-1 p-6 transition-margin duration-300 ${!isMobile&&sidebarOpen?'ml-64':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Outlet,{})})]})]});}
